titleFormatted.en:
[[action]] departure to [[hh]]:[[mm]] o'clock with parameters: 
Preconditioning [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
weekdays only [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Off peak charging [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
weekdays only [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
ends at [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]] o'clock
titleFormatted.de:
[[action]] Abfahrt auf [[hh]]:[[mm]] Uhr mit Parametern festlegen: 
Vorheizen [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
Nur Wochentage [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Aufladen außerhalb der Spitzenzeiten [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
Nur Wochentage [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
endet um [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]] Uhr
titleFormatted.nl:
[[action]] vertrek om [[hh]]:[[mm]] uur met parameters: 
Voorconditionering [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
alleen doordeweeks [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Opladen buiten piekuren [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
alleen doordeweeks [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
eindigt om [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]] uur
titleFormatted.fr:
[[action]] départ à [[hh]]:[[mm]] heures avec les paramètres : 
Préconditionnement [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
uniquement les jours de la semaine [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Recharge hors heures de pointe [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
uniquement les jours de la semaine [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
se termine à [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]] heures
titleFormatted.it:
[[action]] partenza alle [[hh]]:[[mm]] con parametri: 
Precondizionamento [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
solo nei giorni feriali [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Carica fuori dalle ore di punta [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
solo nei giorni feriali [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
termina alle [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]]
titleFormatted.sv:
[[action]] avgång till [[hh]]:[[mm]] med parametrar: 
Förvärmning [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
bara vardagar [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Laddning utanför toppbelastning [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
bara vardagar [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
slutar kl [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]]
titleFormatted.no:
[[action]] avreise til [[hh]]:[[mm]] med parametere: 
Forvarming [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
bare ukedager [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Lading utenfor toppbelastning [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
bare ukedager [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
slutter kl [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]]
titleFormatted.es:
[[action]] salida a las [[hh]]:[[mm]] con parámetros: 
Preacondicionamiento [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
solo días laborables [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Carga fuera de horas punta [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
solo días laborables [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
termina a las [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]]
titleFormatted.da:
[[action]] afgang til [[hh]]:[[mm]] med parametre: 
Forvarmning [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
kun hverdage [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Opladning uden for spidsbelastning [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
kun hverdage [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
slutter kl [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]]
titleFormatted.ru:
[[action]] отъезд в [[hh]]:[[mm]] с параметрами: 
Предварительное кондиционирование [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
только в будние дни [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Зарядка вне пиковых часов [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
только в будние дни [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
заканчивается в [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]]
titleFormatted.pl:
[[action]] wyjazd o [[hh]]:[[mm]] z parametrami: 
Przedkondycjonowanie [[preconditioning_enabled]], 
tylko w dni robocze [[preconditioning_weekdays_only]]. 
Ładowanie poza godzinami szczytu [[off_peak_charging_enabled]], 
tylko w dni robocze [[off_peak_charging_weekdays_only]], 
kończy się o [[op_hh]]:[[op_mm]]

hint.en: Sets a time at which departure should be completed.
hint.de: Legt einen Zeitpunkt fest, zu dem die Abfahrt abgeschlossen sein soll.
hint.nl: Stelt een tijdstip in waarop het vertrek voltooid moet zijn.
hint.fr: Définit une heure à laquelle le départ doit être terminé.
hint.it: Imposta un'ora in cui la partenza deve essere completata.
hint.sv: Ställer in en tidpunkt då avresan ska vara klar.
hint.no: Setter en tidspunkt der avreise skal være fullført.
hint.es: Establece una hora en la que la salida debe estar completada.
hint.da: Indstiller et tidspunkt, hvor afgang skal være fuldført.
hint.ru: Устанавливает время, когда должен быть завершен отъезд.
hint.pl: Ustawia czas, w którym wyjazd powinien być zakończony.
